# `ConversationContentListPickerSection` Definition

List Picker object for presenting a section of selectable items.

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| title | `string` | No | Required title for the section. |
| multipleSelection | `boolean` | No | Whether multiple items can be selected in this section. |
| items | [`ConversationContentListPickerItem[]`](conversationcontentlistpickeritem-definition.md) | No | List of items to choice from in the section |
